title: Acropolis with a private tour
text: We hired Private Greek tours and arrived at the Acropolis before the mass of crowds. They had our tickets to enter and so we had no lines or delays. By the time we were leaving tour buses lined the roads waiting to get in. I loved this site because it was so awe inspiring to see a structure of this magnitude built without modern tools. It was unthinkable!

title: Excellent Service
text: We stayed at the Nerva Boutique hotel and was amazed at the wonderful and friendly service we received. They arranged for pick up and drop off of the airport and port. We had a delicious breakfast preparred by Sally every morning! She is delightful and wants to please everyone. We found our room sunny and bright, cool and relaxing. We even had 2 bathrooms in our Deluxe room. I would definately stay here again. It is within walking distance of several Rome Attractions.

title: Athens- Private Greek tour
text: We used Private Greek Tours and found Lazaros Liogas and his son Bill excellent! Bill is young and charming, speeks excellent English and very informative about Greek culture and his city. Lazaros was an exceptional driver and had a very comfortable auto for 4 adults. They met us promptly at the Port and made sure we saw everything that was on our list and more. He took us around traffice situations and brought us to the steps of the Acropolis before the crowds hit. Athens is a big city and knowing the ins and outs of manuvering through it was the best with this tour. Highlights were the Acropolis, Parliament changing of the guards and the highest point in Athens for the views of the city! Plaka shopping is a must!

title: Charming Hotel and Excellent Staff!
text: Villa Lara is like walking into your own home/bedroom. We arrived not feelung well and the staff was very accommodating in showing us where the pharmacy was in Bayeux. The bedroom was sweet and cheerful, with a beautiful view of the Bayeux Cathedral. Charming Bayeux just steps away! A full service Boutique Hotel in the heart of Normandy. Our appreciation of the staff and their excellent care made our visit the best in France!

title: Urban and Swanky
text:
If you are looking for a "hip" hotel, this ones for you! Location good for downtown and universities. Somewhat noisy for sleeping with street noise.
Good bar/ restaurant with locally grown and sourced foods.
